hiveArticle.title: ColourfulPhotography - A Local Market
hiveArticle.body:
A Local Market inside a temple premises selling flowers and [Puja Samagri](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puja_(Hinduism)).
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYTVL8jFdBrQhaYYNmEeV3LAqLseoEreGGKot4LVfJFau/image.png)

### Camera : Nokia 6
